mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT FROM board_cafe ORDER BY num ASC) result1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND ${endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_cafe (num, writer, title, content, viewCount, regdate) VALUES(board_cafe_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE)
